attributes.action: abolish the television license and revert to using advertising to fund the BBC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a university student i am sick and tired of being hawked down by the tv licensing people to pay for something i dont need, TV is a commodity not a necessity, and i don't feel we should have to pay for the right to simply own a television with connection.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
